attributes.action: Stop Fenland and Cambridgeshire Councils Closing Mepal Mx Track
attributes.background:
Fenland & Cambridgeshire County Councillors to close UK's #1 Winter MotoX Track at Mepal!! Mepal brought 2000 people to this district over this weekend.
Hundreds of kids with nowhere to ride.
Fenland & Cambs Council are NOT "100% Behind the people" ignoring hundreds of locals letters of support.

rejection.details:
The decision to close Mepal Mx Track appears to be one to be taken by your local council and not the UK Government. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are and how to contact them: 
  
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
